articles.title: Manhole fires on Newbury Street prompt building and street evacuations
articles.description:
Sidewalks were evacuated from Gloucester Street to Dartmouth Street, as were four buildings, the fire department said, after six manholes exploded.

The post Manhole fires on Newbury Street prompt building and street evacuations appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Six manholes exploded on Newbury Street, causing immediate evacuations.
Sidewalks from Gloucester to Dartmouth Street and four buildings were evacuated.
Residents faced disruptions and potential safety hazards due to the explosions.

articles.title: South Station’s new fare gates still out of service more than a week after snow storm
articles.description:
The fare gates have been out of service since last week, when Boston was hit with a major snowstorm.

The post South Station’s new fare gates still out of service more than a week after snow storm appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: South Station's new fare gates have been out of service since the snowstorm on January 26.
The malfunction affects thousands of daily commuters relying on the station for travel.
Passengers face delays and inconvenience as repairs remain unresolved over a week later.

articles.title: Jaylen Brown scores 33 as Celtics beat Mavs 110-100 despite Flagg’s 36 points
articles.description:
Jaylen Brown had 33 points and 11 rebounds, and the Boston Celtics beat Dallas 110-100, handing the Mavericks their season-worst fifth consecutive loss.

The post Jaylen Brown scores 33 as Celtics beat Mavs 110-100 despite Flagg’s 36 points appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jaylen Brown scored 33 points and grabbed 11 rebounds.
Mavericks suffer fifth consecutive loss, impacting their playoff chances.

articles.title: Clintons finalize agreement to testify in House Epstein probe, bowing to threat of contempt vote
articles.description:
The arrangement comes after months of negotiating between the two sides as Republicans sought to make the Clintons a focal point in a House committee’s investigation into Epstein.

The post Clintons finalize agreement to testify in House Epstein probe, bowing to threat of contempt vote appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Clintons agree to testify in House Epstein probe after months of negotiations.
Republicans aimed to spotlight the Clintons in the investigation, intensifying political scrutiny.
Boston residents may see increased political discourse as the investigation unfolds.
